VS Code Extension

AI Agents
in your editor

Run Claude, Codex, Gemini, and Cursor as editor tabs.
Stop context-switching. Ship faster.

Install Extension
$bunx agent-swarm
my-project
CCClaude
CXCodex
GXGemini
CRCursor
index.ts
Claude Code
>Fix the authentication bug in src/auth.ts
I'll analyze the authentication module and fix the issue.
Found the problem - the JWT token validation is missing
the expiry check. Let me fix that...
Reading: src/auth.ts
Editing: src/auth.ts
Done. The token now properly validates expiry.

How it works

Agents as Tabs

Each AI agent runs in its own editor tab. See your code and agents side by side.

Swarm Mode

Let agents spawn sub-agents. Get second opinions or run parallel tasks from one session.

Any Agent

Built-in support for Claude, Codex, Gemini, Cursor. Add custom agents with a 2-letter code.

Keyboard-first

Everything is one shortcut away

New agentCmd+Shift+A
New task with contextCmd+Shift+N
Clear & restartCmd+Shift+C
Label agentCmd+Shift+L
Generate commitCmd+Shift+G
Go to terminalCmd+Shift+I

Ready to ship faster?

Install from VS Code Marketplace or run the MCP server directly.
